name: Afar
greeting: ሰላም, እንኳን ደህና መጡ። እኛ አፋርን እንዴት እንደሚናገር ነን።

name: Afrikaans
greeting: Hallo, Welkom by aiBot. Ons praat Afrikaans.

name: Akan
greeting: Ɛte sɛn, Akwaaba na aiBot. Yɛde bɛkɔ Akan kasa.

name: Albanian
greeting: Përshëndetje, Mirësevini në aiBot. Ne flasim shqip.

name: Amharic
greeting: ሰላም, እንኳን ደህና መጡ። እኛ አማርኛ እንዴት እንደሚናገር ነን።

name: Arabic
greeting: مرحبًا، أهلاً بك في aiBot. نتحدث العربية.

name: Aragonese
greeting: Hola, Bienvenito a aiBot. Parlamos aragonés.

name: Armenian
greeting: Բարև, Բարի գալուստ aiBot-ին։ Մենք խոսում ենք հայերեն։

name: Assamese
greeting: নমস্কাৰ, aiBotলৈ স্বাগতম। আমি অসমীয়া ভাষা বলোঁ।

name: Avaric
greeting: Маршо, ХӀош вацIа aiBot-ийн. Ман дIа Авар мацI.

name: Aymara
greeting: Janiwa, Jiwakiña aiBot-manta. Aymara arunakuna nayraruwayku.

name: Azerbaijani
greeting: Salam, aiBot-a xoş gəlmisiniz. Biz Azərbaycan dili ilə danışırıq.

name: Bambara
greeting: I ni ce, I ni sogoma aiBot. A bamanankan bɛn na.

name: Bashkir
greeting: Сәләм, aiBot-ка рәхим итегез. Башҡорт теле белән үтәміз.

name: Basque
greeting: Kaixo, Ongi etorri aiBot-era. Euskara hitz egiten dugu.

name: Belarusian
greeting: Прывітанне, Сардэчна запрашаем у aiBot. Мы размаўляем па-беларуску.

name: Bengali
greeting: হ্যালো, aiBot-এ আপনাকে স্বাগতম। আমরা বাংলা ভাষা বলি।

name: Bihari
greeting: नमस्कार, aiBot में आपका स्वागत है। हम बिहारी भाषा बोलते हैं।

name: Bislama
greeting: Halo, Welkam long aiBot. Mifala i tok Bislama.

name: Bosnian
greeting: Zdravo, Dobrodošli na aiBot. Govorimo bosanski jezik.

name: Breton
greeting: Demat, Degemer mat da aiBot. Ni a gomz brezhoneg.

name: Bulgarian
greeting: Здравейте, Добре дошли в aiBot. Говорим на български език.

name: Burmese
greeting: မင်္ဂလာပါ၊ aiBot သို့ ကြိုဆိုပါတယ်။ မြန်မာစာကို စကားပြောနိုင်ပါသည်။

name: Catalan; Valencian
greeting: Hola, Benvingut a aiBot. Parlem català; valencià.

name: Chamorro
greeting: Håfa, Bienvenido/a i aiBot. Hu hasso Chamorro.

name: Chechen
greeting: Саламатлоь, aiBot-хьа махкӀа. Чечен мотт.

name: Chichewa; Chewa; Nyanja
greeting: Moni, Mwalandiridwa ku aiBot. Tili ndi chiyawo; chichewa; chinyanja.

name: Chinese
nativeName: 中文 (Zhōngwén), 汉语, 漢語
greeting: 你好，欢迎来到 aiBot。我们会说中文。

name: Chuvash
greeting: Пĕрнĕ, aiBot-сем ĕртӑсен. Чăвашла саналамăш.

name: Cornish
greeting: Dydh da, Dynnargh dhis dhe aiBot. Ni a wra kewsel Kernewek.

name: Corsican
greeting: Bonghjornu, Benvinuti in aiBot. Noi parliamo corsu.

name: Cree
greeting: Tânisi, Tawâw nâpêw aiBot. Niya mîna nêhiyawêwin.

name: Croatian
greeting: Bok, Dobrodošli na aiBot. Govorimo hrvatski.

name: Czech
greeting: Ahoj, Vítejte v aiBotu. Mluvíme česky.

name: Danish
greeting: Hej, Velkommen til aiBot. Vi taler dansk.

name: Divehi; Dhivehi; Maldivian;
greeting: އެންމެފަހު، aiBot ގެ މައިނަލްގެ މަޖިލިއުން. މަލެޑިވިއަން ބަހުން ބަދަލުކުރެވިފައިވާނެ.

name: Dutch
greeting: Hallo, Welkom bij aiBot. Wij spreken Nederlands.

name: English
greeting: Hello, Welcome to aiBot. We speak English.

name: Esperanto
greeting: Saluton, Bonvenon al aiBot. Ni parolas Esperanton.

name: Estonian
greeting: Tere, Tere tulemast aiBoti. Me räägime eesti keelt.

name: Ewe
greeting: Woezɔ, Akpe na aiBot. Mawu be Ewe gbe.

name: Faroese
greeting: Hallo, Velkomin til aiBot. Vit tala føroyskt.

name: Fijian
greeting: Bula, Ni sa bula vinaka ki aiBot. Keitou vosa na vosa Viti.

name: Finnish
greeting: Hei, Tervetuloa aiBotiin. Puhumme suomea.

name: French
greeting: Bonjour, Bienvenue sur aiBot. Nous parlons français.

name: Fula; Fulah; Pulaar; Pular
greeting: Salam, Jërejëf leen aiBot. Mi jëmmba Fulfulde; Pulaar; Pular.

name: Galician
greeting: Ola, Benvido a aiBot. Falamos galego.

name: Georgian
greeting: გამარჯობა, კეთილი იყოს aiBot-ზე. ჩვენ ვლაპარაკობთ ქართულს.

name: German
greeting: Hallo, Willkommen bei aiBot. Wir sprechen Deutsch.

name: Greek, Modern
greeting: Γεια σας, Καλώς ήρθατε στο aiBot. Μιλάμε Ελληνικά, Σύγχρονα.

name: Guaraní
greeting: Mba'éichapa, Karaiñe'ẽ aiBot-pe. Ñe'ẽ Guarani ñane ñe'ẽ.

name: Gujarati
greeting: નમસ્તે, aiBot માં આપનું સ્વાગત છે. અમે ગુજરાતી બોલીએ છીએ.

name: Haitian; Haitian Creole
greeting: Bonjou, Byenveni nan aiBot. Nou pale Kreyòl Ayisyen.

name: Hausa
greeting: Sannu, Barka da zuwa zu aiBot. Mu ƙara Hausa.

name: Hebrew (modern)
greeting: שלום, ברוכים הבאים ל-aiBot. אנחנו מדברים עברית (מודרנית).

name: Herero
greeting: Tjike, Ombwa yOmbwa na aiBot. Ombwa yOmbwa tjiHerero.

name: Hindi
greeting: नमस्ते, aiBot में आपका स्वागत है। हम हिंदी बोलते हैं।

name: Hiri Motu
greeting: Hello, Welkam long aiBot. Em i toktok Hiri Motu.

name: Hungarian
greeting: Szia, Üdvözöllek az aiBot-on. Beszélünk magyarul.

name: Interlingua
greeting: Salute, Benvenite a aiBot. Nos parla Interlingua.

name: Indonesian
greeting: Halo, Selamat datang di aiBot. Kami berbicara bahasa Indonesia.

name: Interlingue
nativeName: Originally called Occidental; then Interlingue after WWII
greeting: Salute, Benvenite a aiBot. Nos parla Interlingue.

name: Irish
greeting: Dia dhuit, Fáilte go dtí aiBot. Labhraímid Gaeilge.

name: Igbo
greeting: Ndewo, Nnọọ na aiBot. Anyị na-akpọ Igbo.

name: Inupiaq
greeting: Aluu, Qanuq uqaqti aiBot. Iñupiaq-llu qanruyutait.

name: Ido
greeting: Saluti, Bonveno al aiBot. Ni parolas Ido.

name: Icelandic
greeting: Halló, Velkomin(n) í aiBot. Við tölum íslensku.

name: Italian
greeting: Ciao, Benvenuto(a) su aiBot. Parliamo italiano.

name: Inuktitut
greeting: ᐊᔭ, ᐊᕙᑲᖅᑐᖅ aiBot-ᐊᖅ. ᐃᓄᒃᑎᑐᑦ-ᐊᖅ ᐊᓂᒃᑯᑦᑐᖅ.

name: Japanese
nativeName: 日本語 (にほんご／にっぽんご)
greeting: こんにちは、aiBotへようこそ。私たちは日本語を話します。

name: Javanese
greeting: Halo, Sugeng rawuh menyang aiBot. Kita ngomong Jawa.

name: Kalaallisut, Greenlandic
greeting: Aluu, Tikiaritai aiBot-illu. Kalaallisut, Greenlandic-illu pillugu.

name: Kannada
greeting: ನಮಸ್ಕಾರ, aiBot ಗೆ ಸ್ವಾಗತ. ನಾವು ಕನ್ನಡ ಮಾತನಾಡುತ್ತೇವೆ.

name: Kanuri
greeting: Sannu, Barka da zuwa zu aiBot. Mu ƙara Kanuri.

name: Kashmiri
greeting: नमस्ते, aiBot चैंडी चुख आव. असीं कॉशुर बोलन.

name: Kazakh
greeting: Сәлеметсіз бе, aiBot-ға қош келдіңіз. Біз қазақ тілін айтамыз.

name: Khmer
greeting: សួស្តី, សូមស្វាគមន៍មកកាន់ aiBot។ យើងនិយាយភាសាខ្មែរ។

name: Kikuyu, Gikuyu
greeting: Wega, Karibu kwa aiBot. Tunazungumza Kikuyu.

name: Kinyarwanda
greeting: Muraho, Murakaza neza ku aiBot. Twaravuga Kinyarwanda.

name: Kirghiz, Kyrgyz
greeting: Салам, aiBotке көрөнүүгө келгениз. Биз Кыргыз тилинде сөйлөшөбүз.

name: Komi
greeting: Сывӧз, Йӧтӧ aiBot-ӧн. Мыд коми кыв.

name: Kongo
greeting: Mbote, Tikala malamu na aiBot. Tuna lingala Kikongo.

name: Korean
greeting: 안녕하세요, aiBot에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 우리는 한국어를 말합니다.

name: Kurdish
greeting: Silav, Bi xêr hatî ser aiBotê. Em bi kurdî diaxivin.

name: Kwanyama, Kuanyama
greeting: Wa luhu, Ondjandja okwa aiBot. Amwe tyaKwanyama.

name: Latin
greeting: Salve, Gratias tibi ago quod ad aiBot venisti. Latine loquimur.

name: Luxembourgish, Letzeburgesch
greeting: Moien, Wëllkomm bei aiBot. Mir schwätzen Lëtzebuergesch.

name: Luganda
greeting: Abalungi, Buli kwo aiBot. Twagala Luganda.

name: Limburgish, Limburgan, Limburger
greeting: Hallo, Welkom bie aiBot. V'r kalle Limburgs.

name: Lingala
greeting: Mbote, Tikala malamu na aiBot. Tuna lingala.

name: Lao
greeting: ສະບາຍດີ, ຍິນດີຕ້ອນຮັບເຂົ້າມາກັບ aiBot. ພວກເຮົາເວົ້າພາສາລາວ.

name: Lithuanian
greeting: Labas, Sveiki atvykę į aiBot. Mes kalbame lietuviškai.

name: Luba-Katanga
greeting: Mbote, Tshibuka na aiBot. Tuna lingala Luba-Katanga.

name: Latvian
greeting: Sveiki, Laipni lūdzam aiBot. Mēs runājam latviešu valodā.

name: Manx
greeting: Shoh slaynt, Failt ort da aiBot. Ta shin gynsaghey Gaelg.

name: Macedonian
greeting: Здраво, Добредојдовте на aiBot. Ние зборуваме македонски.

name: Malagasy
greeting: Manao ahoana, Tongasoa ao amin'ny aiBot. Miteny Malagasy isika.

name: Malay
greeting: Halo, Selamat datang ke aiBot. Kami bertutur dalam Bahasa Melayu.

name: Malayalam
greeting: ഹലോ, aiBotലേക്ക് സ്വാഗതം. ഞങ്ങൾ മലയാളം സംസാരിക്കുന്നു.

name: Maltese
greeting: Bongu, Merħba għall-aiBot. Nitkellmu bil-Malti.

name: Māori
greeting: Kia ora, Nau mai ki aiBot. E kōrero ana mātou i te reo Māori.

name: Marathi (Marāṭhī)
greeting: नमस्कार, aiBot वर आपले स्वागत आहे. आम्ही मराठी बोलतो.

name: Marshallese
greeting: Yokwe, Komol tata aiBot. Ammok ilo Marshallese.

name: Mongolian
greeting: Сайн байна уу, aiBot руу тавтай морилно уу. Бид Монгол хэлээр ярина.

name: Navajo, Navaho
greeting: Yá'át'ééh, Késhmish aiBot. T'áá ákót'éego diné bizaad yázhí.

name: Norwegian Bokmål
greeting: Hei, velkommen til aiBot. Vi snakker norsk bokmål.

name: North Ndebele
greeting: Sawubona, Wamukelekile ku aiBot. Siyakhuluma isiNdebele saseNtshonalanga.

name: Nepali
greeting: नमस्ते, aiBotमा स्वागत छ। हामी नेपाली बोल्छौं।

name: Ndonga
greeting: Ombwa, Ongiwo aiBot. Ongiwo ndonga ndiilonga.

name: Norwegian Nynorsk
greeting: Hei, velkomen til aiBot. Vi snakkar norsk nynorsk.

name: Norwegian
greeting: Hei, velkommen til aiBot. Vi snakker norsk.

name: Nuosu
greeting: Nyob zoo, Zoo siab txais tos koj rau aiBot. Peb muaj hais lus Nuosu.

name: South Ndebele
greeting: Sawubona, Wamukelekile ku aiBot. Siyakhuluma isiNdebele saseNingizimu.

name: Occitan
greeting: Bonjorn, Benvengut a aiBot. Parlam occitan.

name: Ojibwe, Ojibwa
greeting: Boozhoo, Aanii, Ojibwemowin aadizookaan.

name: Old Church Slavonic, Church Slavic, Church Slavonic, Old Bulgarian, Old Slavonic
greeting: Врѣдъ, Добро пожаловати въ aiBot. Глаголемъ старославѣньскъ ѩзыкъ.

name: Oromo
greeting: Akkam, Galatoomi aiBot irraa. Afaan Oromootiin akka kennuuf.

name: Oriya
greeting: ନମସ୍କାର, aiBotକୁ ସ୍ୱାଗତମ୍। ଆମେ ଓଡ଼ିଆ କଥା କରୁଛି।

name: Ossetian, Ossetic
greeting: Вæлком, aiBotы фæстæ. Мæгъы фæлæдзы ирæды.

name: Panjabi, Punjabi
greeting: ਸਤ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਅਕਾਲ, ਜੀ ਆਇਆਂ ਨੂੰ aiBot ਵਿੱਚ। ਅਸੀਂ ਪੰਜਾਬੀ ਬੋਲਦੇ ਹਾਂ।

name: Pāli
greeting: नमस्कार, aiBotमध्ये आपले स्वागत आहे. आम्ही पाली बोलतो.

name: Persian
greeting: سلام، به aiBot خوش آمدید. ما فارسی صحبت می‌کنیم.

name: Polish
greeting: Cześć, Witamy w aiBot. Mówimy po polsku.

name: Pashto, Pushto
greeting: سلام، aiBot ته خوش آمدید. موږ پښتو خبرې کوو.

name: Portuguese
greeting: Olá, Bem-vindo ao aiBot. Nós falamos português.

name: Quechua
greeting: Rimaykullayki, aiBotpiyqa kusikuyki. Runasimi rimanichu.

name: Romansh
greeting: Bun di, Bienvegnì a aiBot. Nus chattain rumantsch.

name: Kirundi
greeting: Amahoro, Murakaza neza ku aiBot. Tugira ururimi rwacu rwa Kirundi.

name: Romanian, Moldavian, Moldovan
greeting: Salut, Bun venit la aiBot. Vorbind română, moldovenească.

name: Russian
greeting: Привет, Добро пожаловать в aiBot. Мы говорим на русском языке.

name: Sanskrit (Saṁskṛta)
greeting: नमस्ते, aiBot में आपका स्वागत है। हम संस्कृत बोलते हैं।

name: Sardinian
greeting: Ciao, Benvenutu a aiBot. Nois faeddamos sardu.

name: Sindhi
greeting: سلام، aiBot تي ڀلي ٿو. ھان سنڌي ٻولياندسان.

name: Northern Sami
greeting: Buorre, Bures boahtin aiBotiin. Mii sáhtat sámegiela.

name: Samoan
greeting: Talofa, Fa'amolemole ia aiBot. O le a matou tautala i le gagana Samoa.

name: Sango
greeting: Ködörögbà, Na tî aiBot. Tî sängö tî bêa.

name: Serbian
greeting: Здраво, Добродошли на aiBot. Ми говоримо српски.

name: Scottish Gaelic; Gaelic
greeting: Halò, Fàilte gu aiBot. Tha sinn a' bruidhinn Gàidhlig na h-Alba.

name: Shona
greeting: Mhoro, Makadini ku aiBot. Tinotaura chiShona.

name: Sinhala, Sinhalese
greeting: ආයුබෝවන්, aiBot වෙත සුබ දහවල් වේවා. අපි සිංහල කතා කරයි.

name: Slovak
greeting: Ahoj, Vitajte v aiBote. Hovoríme po slovensky.

name: Slovene
greeting: Zdravo, Dobrodošli v aiBotu. Govorimo slovensko.

name: Somali
greeting: Salaam, Soo dhawoow aiBot. Waxaan ku hadalno Soomaali.

name: Southern Sotho
greeting: Lumela, Kea le amohela mo aiBot. Re bua Sesotho sa Leboa.

name: Spanish; Castilian
greeting: Hola, Bienvenido/a a aiBot. Hablamos español; castellano.

name: Sundanese
greeting: Halo, Wilujeng sumping di aiBot. Kami ngomong basa Sunda.

name: Swahili
greeting: Hujambo, Karibu kwa aiBot. Tunazungumza Kiswahili.

name: Swati
greeting: Sawubona, Wamukelekile ku aiBot. Sihamba siSwati.

name: Swedish
greeting: Hej, Välkommen till aiBot. Vi talar svenska.

name: Tamil
greeting: வணக்கம், எங்கள் aiBot க்கு வரவேற்கிறோம். நாங்கள் தமிழ் பேசுகிறோம்.

name: Telugu
greeting: నమస్కారం, aiBot కు స్వాగతం. మాకు తెలుగు మాట్లాడుతాము.

name: Tajik
greeting: Салом, Хуш омадед ба aiBot. Мо забони тоҷикӣ гап мезанем.

name: Thai
greeting: สวัสดีครับ ยินดีต้อนรับสู่ aiBot พวกเราพูดภาษาไทยครับ

name: Vietnamese
greeting: Xin chào, Chào mừng đến với iBot. Chúng tôi nói tiếng Việt.
